name: Stabilize Powder
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Combat. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, M (a few drops of liquor)
text: Ammunition currently loaded in the target firearm is less prone to misfire. Decrease the misfire range by 1 + 1 per five caster levels (maximum +5, minimum misfire 0) for the ammunition currently loaded into that firearm.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (少量烈酒)
savingThrow_zh: 意志，通过则无效 (无害，物体)
text_zh:
这个法术工作方式如同石肤术 (stoneskin)，不过你可以将持续时间以10分钟为单位分配给接触到的复数生物。

一旦这个法术为一个生物吸收了每施法者等级10点伤害 (最高150)，该生物身上的法术效果结束。
